sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词都有"医生"之意。
means: doctor ： 普通用词，泛指各科医生，即一切有行医资格的人。
physician ： 指医院的内科医生。
surgeon ： 指专修外科或专修人体某个部分的外科专科医生，这种医生一般需对患者进行手术治疗。
dentist ： 指专门从事治牙的医生。

word_mean: 牙医师：美国指从合格的牙科学院获得学位，并由州牙科审查委员会批准牙科开业的人

sentence.Network_en: A dentist may decide to extract the tooth to prevent recurrent trouble.
sentence.Network_cn: 牙医可能会决定拔掉那颗牙，以免反复发作。

sentence.Network_en: Think of the clammy hands you get when you visit the dentist!
sentence.Network_cn: 想想你去看牙医时那双黏糊糊的手！

sentence.Network_en: The dentist commenced to dig, drill and finally fill the offending tooth.
sentence.Network_cn: 牙医开始在那颗有问题的牙齿上挖洞，钻孔，直到最后把它补好。

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 18th cent.: from French dentiste, from dent 'tooth', from Latin dens, dent-

entry.def: A dentist is a person who is qualified to examine and treat people's teeth.

example.ex: Visit your dentist twice a year for a check-up.
example.tran: 每年去牙医处做两次牙齿检查。

means.word_mean: 1. a person qualified to practice dentistry

auth_sentence.content: Fritha Ellis-Proughten went to the dentist for root canal treatment.
auth_sentence.res_content: Fritha Ellis-Proughten went to the dentist for root canal treatment.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Fritha Ellis-Proughten went to the dentist for root canal treatment.

auth_sentence.content: You can't be a dentist and win the Olympics.
auth_sentence.res_content: You can't be a dentist and win the Olympics.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: You can't be a dentist and win the Olympics.

auth_sentence.content: Seriously, I'd rather visit the dentist.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Seriously, I'd rather visit the dentist.

stems_affixes.word_buile: e出,无+dent牙齿,凹+ate表形容词,也可表示名词→无齿的
in进入+dent牙齿,凹+ed……的→进入牙齿状→锯齿状的
e出,无+dent牙齿,凹+ate表形容词,也可表示名词→无齿的
dent牙齿,凹→像牙齿咬的痕迹
in进入+dent牙齿,凹+ure表名词→古代契约锯成锯齿状,一分为二,一人一半
dent牙齿,凹→像牙齿咬的痕迹

sentences.en: I have got toothache, so I must go to a dentist.
sentences.cn: 我牙疼, 必须去看牙医。

jushi.english: I have got toothache, so I must go to a dentist.
He cried blue murder when the dentist pulled his tooth out.
jushi.chinese: 当牙医给他拔牙时,他大惊小怪地叫喊。
